description: This table holds the history of whether the discharge-not-billed (DNB) check being acted on was overridden or undone.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing activity history record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DNB_OVERRIDE_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates whether the discharged-not-billed check/request for anticipated payment (DNB/RAP) was overridden by the action (Yes), or had the override removed by the action (No).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
